title: R.I.P. Arthur C. Clarke
author: VD
content_html: While I don’t think 2001: A Space Odyssey has held up terribly well – I watched it a few months ago as well as reading the later books in what somehow turned into a series – I considered The Fountains of Paradise to be one of the truly great science fiction classics, and “The Nine Billion Names of God” to be one of the best short stories the genre has ever produced.
